arts.ttl: Spain XI vs Turkiye – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Turkiye host Spain at the Konya Buyuksehir Belediyesi Stadium on Sunday in their second fixture of the 2026 FIFA World Cup qualifiers. Both nations secured impressive opening victories in Group E, with the Turks defeating Georgia 3-2 while Spain comprehensively beat Bulgaria 3-0 away from home. This crucial encounter could determine who tops the group, […] The post Spain XI vs Turkiye – Predicted lineup and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Spain boss comments on Barcelona forward’s chances of playing vs Turkey – ‘He is training very well’
arts.sum: After a 3-0 win over Bulgaria, Spain are gearing up for a tougher challenge tomorrow evening as they take on Turkey. Barcelona superstar Lamine Yamal suffered an injury scare in the first game, but it was later revealed to be minor discomfort.
